title: Kalshi prediction market hits record trading volumes in October
body: Kalshi, the main competitor of Polymarket, achieved peak record volumes in October. Recently, prediction markets expanded above $1B in monthly volumes. Kalshi prediction markets set a monthly trading volume record, breaking above $4.39B in October. The platform, which does not rely on a blockchain to settle its predictions, relied mostly on sports bets to get ahead of Polymarket. Kalshi activity reached peak levels in October, driven by the overall expansion of prediction markets and interest in trading current events. | Source: Dune Analytics . For Kalshi, the strongest week was at the end of October, when the platform achieved nearly $1B in notional volumes. In the past month, overall Kalshi activity was at a higher baseline. Kalshi also gained exposure on a general expansion of prediction markets, linked to active current events. The activity did not always reflect the accuracy of predictions, as the platform recently miscalculated the results of the Dutch elections, alongside Polymarket. Kalshi taps Web2 users While Polymarket existed for crypto natives, Kalshi’s success lies in quickly reaching Web2 users. The integration with Robinhood and the general availability of predictions gives Kalshi a head start in mainstream adoption. Polymarket still relies on wallet and crypto usage, and has a barrier to entry, still requiring some crypto ownership. Despite the expanded marketing, Kalshi still went through glitches, including a market outage. Polymarket also had a temporary outage, though still allowing experienced traders to use its API and continue their positions. The platform is still viewed with skepticism, due to its aggressive influencer marketing, and attempts to take over crypto native traders. Can Kalshi pass Polymarket? In October, Polymarket came in second among prediction markets, with $2.29B in cumulative volumes. For Polymarket, this was the most successful month since October 2024, when volumes surpassed $2B for the first time. Polymarket relied on smaller bets, surpassing its activity levels from the last quarter of 2024. As of October 31, the exchange carried over 76K active wallets, breaking the record from the activity surrounding the US Presidential Elections in 2024. Active wallets expanded from lows of around 14K in October, showing Polymarket could reverse its fortunes. In late 2025, Polymarket still carries most of the volumes for current events. On both Kalshi and Polymarket, the New York mayoral election is still the most active prediction pair. Kalshi reported volumes above $71B, but Polymarket’s pair reported $365M in trades, showing heightened activity and remaining the leading market for the past month. As of November 2025, Polymarket searches on Google are also more active compared to interest in Kalshi. In the past couple of weeks, attention for Polymarket is also higher. The on-chain platform is also widely used in the hopes of an eventual airdrop. Both Kalshi and Polymarket are still facing doubts that their approach to risk is not actual gambling. How prediction markets are viewed by users, and regulated by regional authorities, may be the main factor in limiting growth. In the coming year, Kalshi and Polymarket may also meet with more competition from other rising platforms. As crypto trading slows down, predictions may become a key alternative to direct trading. title: Bitcoin Bull Run in Danger? BTC Tests Critical Support Again
body: Bitcoin is trading at $107,400 at press time, down 3% in the past 24 hours and 7% over the last week. Traders are watching key price levels as the market tests long-term support. With volatility dropping and volume remaining high, several analysts are pointing to this monthly close as a potential turning point. Fibonacci Support Has Held Since 2023 BTC has exhibited a transparent trend since the beginning of 2023. Support has been located at the 38.2% Fibonacci retracement level for every significant correction so far. These levels—approximately $24,843, $49,200, $79,225, and currently $100,547—have indicated local bottoms prior to the recovery of the price. Source: Cas Abbé/X Notably, the most recent monthly candle dropped to the $100,500 area and bounced. This level now serves as a key reference point. According to analyst Cas Abbé, “ If BTC closes a monthly candle below it, the bull run will be most likely over. ” The price remains above this threshold for now, but the margin is narrowing. Meanwhile, Bitcoin’s weekly chart is also showing technical stress. According to Super₿ro, the Bollinger Bands are now at their tightest point on record, with the Bollinger Band Width indicator near 15. This level reflects a rare drop in volatility, often seen before sharp price moves. In previous cycles, similar compression led to short-term dips, followed by rapid reversals to the upside. $BTC weekly tightest squeeze in history for the weekly Bollinger Bands prior squeezes led to a headfake lower and then a rip higher pic.twitter.com/va8UQp5Ifo — Super฿ro (@SuperBitcoinBro) November 3, 2025 Short-Term Ranges Show Liquidity Zones During the weekend, two main liquidity areas formed, according to analyst Daan Crypto Trades. BTC took out the lower bound around $108,500, clearing that level. Another cluster remains near $112,000, with stronger interest building between $105,000 and $106,000. Ted Pillows pointed to large bids around the $106,000–$107,000 zone and added, “What if we dump in the first week and then pump to a new ATH?” These levels are also near long liquidation zones, which could trigger more volatility in the short term. Long-Term Holders Are Selling Into Strength Data from CryptoQuant shows that long-term holders sold over $33 billion worth of BTC in October. This created daily selling pressure of up to $1 billion. CryptoPatel noted that these units came from addresses active across multiple market cycles. “These aren’t weak hands. These are OGs booking profits near the top,” they said. Demand from US investors has slowed in recent weeks, and some large traders have started taking short positions. One of them is Peter Brandt, who confirmed a short in Bitcoin futures. The market is still digesting these changes, as prices trade below recent highs. The post Bitcoin Bull Run in Danger? BTC Tests Critical Support Again appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Massive Bitcoin Investor Deposit Sparks Market Buzz
body: BitcoinWorld Massive Bitcoin Investor Deposit Sparks Market Buzz The cryptocurrency world is abuzz with recent activity involving a prominent Bitcoin investor . In a move that has captured significant attention, an individual identified as Owen Gunden, an early participant in the Bitcoin ecosystem, recently deposited a substantial amount of BTC to the Kraken exchange. This action by a long-term holder often prompts questions about market sentiment and potential future movements. Who is This Prominent Bitcoin Investor? Owen Gunden, a name now circulating widely within crypto circles, is recognized as an early Bitcoin investor . Onchainlens, a reputable analytics platform, reported that Gunden transferred an additional 483.3 BTC to Kraken. This sizable deposit is currently valued at an impressive $52.99 million, making it a noteworthy event for the market. Despite this significant transfer, Gunden retains a substantial holding. His remaining balance stands at an astonishing 8,439 BTC, which is approximately worth $924 million. This indicates a continued strong belief in Bitcoin’s long-term value, even while engaging in large-scale transactions. Significant Deposit: 483.3 BTC, valued at $52.99 million. Remaining Holdings: 8,439 BTC, worth approximately $924 million. Platform Used: Kraken, a well-known cryptocurrency exchange. Understanding the Implications for a Bitcoin Investor When an early Bitcoin investor moves such a large quantity of BTC to an exchange, it naturally raises questions among market observers. Generally, transferring assets to an exchange often signals an intention to sell, or at least to increase liquidity for potential trading activities. This could introduce selling pressure, even if temporary, into the market. However, it is crucial to remember that a deposit does not automatically equate to an immediate sale. The investor might be preparing for various strategies, such as: Profit-taking: Cashing out a portion of their long-held assets. Diversification: Shifting capital into other cryptocurrencies or traditional assets. Liquidity provision: Preparing for a large purchase or investment elsewhere. Strategic trading: Positioning funds for short-term market plays. For the broader crypto market , such a large move by a seasoned participant can sometimes influence sentiment. Traders and analysts closely monitor these on-chain activities to gauge potential market shifts and investor confidence. What Drives an Early Bitcoin Investor to Act Now? The motivation behind such a significant deposit by an early Bitcoin investor can be multifaceted. Current market conditions, personal financial goals, or even a strategic rebalancing of their portfolio could play a role. Bitcoin has seen considerable price movements recently, offering opportune moments for long-term holders to realize profits. Moreover, as the cryptocurrency landscape evolves, early investors often re-evaluate their positions. They might be looking to capitalize on current valuations or mitigate risks based on their personal investment theses. It is a common practice for those with substantial holdings to manage their portfolios actively. Navigating the Market: Insights for Every Bitcoin Investor For any Bitcoin investor , observing the actions of large holders like Owen Gunden provides valuable context. While individual moves should not dictate your entire strategy, they offer a glimpse into the broader market dynamics. It underscores the importance of staying informed about on-chain analytics and market sentiment. Key takeaways for investors include: Stay Informed: Monitor on-chain data and market news regularly. Diversify Wisely: Avoid putting all your capital into a single asset. Understand Motivations: Consider the various reasons behind large transactions. Develop Your Strategy: Base decisions on thorough research and personal risk tolerance, not just on the actions of others. Ultimately, the actions of a single Bitcoin investor , no matter how significant, are just one piece of the complex puzzle that is the crypto market. It serves as a reminder of the dynamic nature of digital assets and the ongoing evolution of investment strategies within this space. Conclusion: What Does This Mean for the Future? Owen Gunden’s substantial deposit to Kraken highlights the continuous movement and rebalancing within the cryptocurrency market. While his motivations remain private, this event certainly adds to the ongoing dialogue about Bitcoin’s price trajectory and the behavior of its earliest adopters. It reinforces the idea that even long-term holders actively manage their assets, contributing to the vibrant and ever-changing landscape of digital finance. As the market matures, such transactions will continue to be a focal point for analysis and discussion. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What does it mean when a large Bitcoin investor deposits BTC to an exchange? When a large Bitcoin investor deposits a significant amount of BTC to an exchange, it typically indicates an intention to sell, trade, or increase liquidity. This action can sometimes signal potential selling pressure in the market, though it doesn’t guarantee an immediate sale. 2. Who is Owen Gunden, and why is his deposit significant? Owen Gunden is identified as an early Bitcoin investor who recently deposited 483.3 BTC (worth $52.99 million) to Kraken. His move is significant because large transactions by long-term holders can influence market sentiment and are closely watched by analysts for potential market shifts. 3. Does this deposit mean Bitcoin’s price will drop? Not necessarily. While a large deposit can create potential selling pressure, it does not guarantee a price drop. The investor might have other intentions, such as diversifying their portfolio, providing liquidity for other investments, or engaging in strategic trading without immediate liquidation. 4. How much Bitcoin does Owen Gunden still hold? After the deposit, Owen Gunden still holds a substantial balance of 8,439 BTC, which is valued at approximately $924 million. This indicates he remains a significant Bitcoin investor with considerable holdings. 5. How can I track similar large transactions by Bitcoin investors? You can track similar large transactions by Bitcoin investors using on-chain analytics platforms like Onchainlens, Glassnode, or CryptoQuant. These platforms provide data on wallet movements, exchange flows, and other metrics that can offer insights into market activity. Share Your Thoughts! What are your thoughts on this significant move by an early Bitcoin investor? Do you think it signals a market shift, or is it just a strategic rebalancing? Share this article on your social media channels and join the conversation! Your insights help enrich our understanding of the dynamic crypto world. title: Ethereum Stablecoin Transaction Volume Reaches Record Level in October! Here's Why
body: Stablecoin transaction volume on the Ethereum network reached an all-time high of $2.82 trillion in October. This increase was primarily driven by investors seeking yield opportunities during the crypto market's slowdown. Stablecoin Transaction Volume on the Ethereum Network Reaches Record $2.8 Trillion in October In October, stablecoin volume on Ethereum surpassed the previous record of $1.94 trillion (September 2025), increasing by 45% month-over-month. Circle's USDC led the way in volume, with $1.62 trillion in transactions. Tether (USDT) came in second with $895.5 billion. MakerDAO's DAI stablecoin came in third with $136 billion in volume. Presto Research analyst Min Jung noted that interest in the stablecoin sector has surged following Circle's IPO and the passage of the Genius Act. Yield farming, particularly around “liquid yield tokens,” has become extremely active, Jung said. At a time when Bitcoin and Ethereum lost 11.5% of their market value and 16.4%, investors were observed using stablecoins as a liquidity management and yield tool. Kronos Research CIO Vincent Liu stated that investors were holding their capital in stablecoins to allocate it to new opportunities during this period. According to experts, this record increase in stablecoin transaction volume indicates that the sector is maturing and is no longer just speculative but expanding into real use cases such as payments and cross-border transactions. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Ethereum Stablecoin Transaction Volume Reaches Record Level in October! Here's Why

title: US Dollar Forecast: UBS Predicts Stronger Dollar as AI Advantage Unleashes Growth
body: BitcoinWorld US Dollar Forecast: UBS Predicts Stronger Dollar as AI Advantage Unleashes Growth The financial world is abuzz with the latest pronouncements from global banking giant UBS . In a significant shift, the firm has revised its US Dollar forecast upwards, signaling a potentially stronger greenback for longer. This pivotal adjustment is rooted in two primary factors: the Federal Reserve’s cautious approach to interest rate cuts and the burgeoning economic advantage the United States is gaining from its leadership in artificial intelligence. For investors, traders, and anyone keen on understanding global macro trends, this shift has profound implications. Let’s explore the driving forces behind UBS’s updated outlook and what it could mean for the global economy and your portfolio. Why the US Dollar Forecast is Shifting? UBS’s revised outlook for the US Dollar is not just a minor tweak; it reflects a fundamental reassessment of global economic dynamics. Historically, the dollar’s strength often correlates with interest rate differentials and economic stability. The current recalibration by UBS points to a sustained period where the US economy is expected to outperform its peers, making dollar-denominated assets more attractive. Interest Rate Differentials: The expectation of higher-for-longer interest rates in the US, compared to other major economies, makes holding dollars more appealing for yield-seeking investors. Economic Resilience: The US economy has shown remarkable resilience, consistently surprising analysts with strong employment figures and consumer spending, even in the face of tighter monetary policy. Safe-Haven Appeal: In times of global uncertainty, the US Dollar often acts as a safe-haven currency. Ongoing geopolitical tensions and economic slowdowns in other regions enhance this appeal. This upward revision suggests that previous expectations for a significant dollar depreciation were premature. Instead, UBS now anticipates the dollar to maintain its strength, potentially appreciating against major currencies like the Euro and the Japanese Yen. This forecast is a critical piece of information for businesses engaged in international trade and investors with diversified portfolios. The Slower Pace of Fed Rate Cuts : What It Means At the heart of UBS’s updated forecast is the Federal Reserve’s evolving stance on monetary policy. The market had initially priced in aggressive rate cuts for 2024, but persistent inflation and robust economic data have prompted the Fed to adopt a more measured approach. This slower pace of Fed rate cuts is a key determinant of dollar strength. What Factors Influence the Fed’s Decision? The Federal Reserve’s mandate includes achieving maximum employment and stable prices. Several indicators guide its policy decisions: Inflation Data: While inflation has moderated from its peaks, it remains stubbornly above the Fed’s 2% target. Core inflation, which excludes volatile food and energy prices, is a particular concern. Employment Figures: The US labor market has remained remarkably strong, with low unemployment rates and consistent job growth. This strength reduces the urgency for the Fed to stimulate the economy through rate cuts. Economic Growth: Better-than-expected GDP growth indicates that the economy can withstand current interest rate levels without falling into recession. Originally, markets anticipated three to five rate cuts in 2024. Now, the consensus is shifting towards fewer cuts, perhaps two or even one, starting later in the year. This “higher for longer” interest rate environment in the US makes dollar-denominated assets, such as Treasury bonds, more attractive compared to those in economies where central banks are expected to cut rates sooner or more aggressively. This differential in interest rates directly supports a stronger dollar, as global capital flows towards higher-yielding opportunities. America’s Emerging AI Advantage Perhaps the most forward-looking aspect of UBS’s revised forecast is the emphasis on the United States’ leadership in artificial intelligence. The AI advantage is not just a technological edge; it’s rapidly translating into tangible economic benefits, boosting productivity, fostering innovation, and attracting significant investment. How is AI Boosting the US Economy? Productivity Growth: AI technologies are enabling businesses across various sectors to automate tasks, optimize processes, and make data-driven decisions, leading to significant gains in productivity. This productivity surge can help offset inflationary pressures and support stronger economic growth without overheating. Innovation Hub: The US is home to the world’s leading AI research institutions, tech giants, and a vibrant startup ecosystem. This environment fosters continuous innovation, creating new industries and job opportunities. Companies like NVIDIA and OpenAI are at the forefront, driving massive investment and technological advancements. Capital Inflow: Global capital is increasingly flowing into US-based AI companies and related infrastructure. This investment not only fuels further growth but also strengthens the dollar as foreign investors convert their currencies to invest in the booming US tech sector. Talent Attraction: The US continues to attract top AI talent from around the globe, further solidifying its position as the epicenter of AI development and application. This technological lead provides a structural tailwind for the US economy, differentiating it from other developed nations that may not be as far along in AI adoption and innovation. The economic benefits from AI are expected to be long-lasting, providing a sustained boost to US competitiveness and attractiveness for investors. UBS Economic Outlook : Key Drivers and Projections The latest UBS economic outlook paints a picture of a resilient US economy supported by a hawkish Federal Reserve and a transformative technological wave. Their projections now factor in a more protracted period of dollar strength, influencing various currency pairs and global capital flows. What are UBS’s Specific Projections? While specific numerical forecasts can fluctuate, the core message from UBS is clear: the dollar is expected to remain strong against major currencies for the foreseeable future. This contrasts with earlier predictions from many analysts who foresaw a significant weakening of the dollar as global central banks caught up with the Fed’s tightening cycle. The revised outlook impacts: EUR/USD: Expected to trade at lower levels than previously anticipated, reflecting the diverging economic paths and monetary policies between the Eurozone and the US. USD/JPY: Likely to remain elevated, given the Bank of Japan’s continued ultra-loose monetary policy and the significant interest rate differential. Emerging Market Currencies: A stronger dollar typically puts pressure on emerging market currencies, making dollar-denominated debt more expensive and potentially leading to capital outflows. This comprehensive assessment by UBS underscores the interconnectedness of monetary policy, technological innovation, and currency markets. Their analysis provides a crucial benchmark for understanding the likely trajectory of the dollar in the coming months. Navigating the Global Economy : Investor Insights For investors, understanding the implications of a stronger dollar and a robust US economy is paramount. The shift in the global economy ‘s landscape, as highlighted by UBS, demands a strategic re-evaluation of portfolios. What Should Investors Consider? Dollar-Denominated Assets: A stronger dollar enhances the returns for international investors holding US assets, such as stocks, bonds, and real estate, when those returns are converted back to their local currencies. US Equity Market: The US equity market, particularly the technology and AI sectors, is likely to remain attractive due to strong corporate earnings potential and innovation. Companies benefiting directly from AI advancements could see continued growth. Commodities: A strong dollar often has a dampening effect on commodity prices, as most commodities are priced in dollars, making them more expensive for non-dollar holders. Currency Hedging: For international investors with significant exposure to non-dollar assets, considering currency hedging strategies might be prudent to mitigate potential losses from a depreciating local currency against the dollar. Diversification: While the US outlook is strong, maintaining a diversified portfolio across different asset classes and geographies remains a fundamental principle of sound investment. The interplay of monetary policy, technological leadership, and geopolitical factors creates a dynamic environment. Investors who adapt their strategies to these evolving conditions will be better positioned to capitalize on opportunities and mitigate risks. Challenges and Considerations Ahead While the outlook for the US dollar and economy appears robust, it is important to acknowledge potential challenges and risks that could alter this trajectory. Persistent Inflation: If inflation proves more stubborn than anticipated, forcing the Fed to maintain higher rates for an even longer period, it could eventually stifle economic growth. Global Economic Slowdown: A significant slowdown in other major economies could eventually drag down US exports and corporate earnings, impacting overall growth. Geopolitical Risks: Escalating geopolitical tensions in various parts of the world could trigger market volatility and impact investor confidence, potentially leading to unpredictable capital flows. AI Regulation and Ethics: While AI offers immense benefits, increasing regulatory scrutiny or unforeseen ethical challenges could slow its adoption or impact the profitability of AI companies. Fiscal Health: Concerns about the US national debt and fiscal deficits could eventually weigh on investor sentiment and the dollar’s long-term stability. These factors highlight that economic forecasts are always subject to revision based on new data and unfolding events. Vigilance and adaptability remain key for navigating the financial markets. Conclusion: The Dollar’s Enduring Strength in an AI-Driven Era UBS’s revised dollar forecast marks a significant moment in global financial markets. Driven by a Federal Reserve committed to combating inflation with a slower pace of rate cuts, and critically, by the United States’ undeniable lead in artificial intelligence, the dollar is poised for a period of sustained strength. This confluence of prudent monetary policy and transformative technological innovation is creating a powerful economic tailwind for the US. For investors, this means a re-evaluation of strategies, with a potential emphasis on dollar-denominated assets and the burgeoning AI sector. While challenges remain, the narrative of US economic resilience, fueled by its AI advantage, is set to dominate the global financial discourse for the foreseeable future, offering both opportunities and a call for strategic adaptation. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Here are some common questions regarding UBS’s latest dollar forecast and its implications: What is UBS’s updated US Dollar forecast? UBS has raised its forecast for the US Dollar, predicting a stronger greenback for a longer period. This is a significant shift from earlier expectations of a more rapid depreciation, reflecting a more optimistic view of the US economy’s resilience and its technological edge. Why is the Federal Reserve slowing its rate cuts? The Federal Reserve is adopting a cautious approach to rate cuts primarily due to persistent inflation remaining above its 2% target and a surprisingly strong US labor market. Fed Chair Jerome Powell and other officials have indicated a need for more evidence that inflation is sustainably moving towards the target before making aggressive cuts. How does the US’s AI advantage impact the dollar? The US’s leadership in artificial intelligence is driving significant productivity gains, fostering innovation, and attracting substantial global capital into its tech sector. This economic boost makes the US an attractive investment destination, increasing demand for the dollar and contributing to its strength. Companies like NVIDIA and OpenAI are examples of this driving force. What are the implications for global investors? A stronger dollar generally makes dollar-denominated assets more appealing. Investors might consider increasing exposure to US equities, particularly in the tech and AI sectors. It also means other currencies might weaken against the dollar, impacting international trade and investment flows. Diversification and currency hedging strategies become more relevant. Could this outlook change? Yes, economic forecasts are dynamic. Factors such as unexpected inflation surges, a severe global economic downturn, significant geopolitical events, or shifts in central bank policies could all lead to revisions in the outlook. Investors should remain informed and adaptable. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the US Dollar’s liquidity and institutional adoption. This post US Dollar Forecast: UBS Predicts Stronger Dollar as AI Advantage Unleashes Growth first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: France moves to classify crypto as ‘unproductive wealth’ under new tax plan
body: Lawmakers in France narrowly approved an amendment that could subject large cryptocurrency holdings to a new wealth tax, classifying them as “unproductive assets.” The amendments brought forward by centrist lawmaker Jean-Paul Matteï on October 22 were passed late Friday in the lower house of the French Parliament with a close vote of 163 in favor and 150 against. Matteï received backing from both socialist and far-right members to add a new clause dubbed Article 977 to France’s tax code, which introduces a tax on “unproductive wealth.” However, it still must pass through the Senate and be included in the final 2026 budget before it becomes law. Under the amendment , the levy would be set at a flat rate of 1%, applied to the portion of net taxable assets exceeding €2 million. The measure also comes with an additional excise tax on tobacco products to supposedly balance the projected loss in government revenue, If enacted, it would replace the country’s current real estate wealth tax framework, Impôt sur la Fortune Immobilière (IFI), with a broader system encompassing several other assets. French lawmakers are reforming a decades-old wealth tax law for crypto France abolished its previous general wealth tax in 2018, replacing it with the IFI, which applies only to real estate not tied to professional activity. Matteï told the National Assembly that this legislation is “economically inconsistent,” excluding from taxation several forms of “idle wealth” like gold, art, and digital assets, while penalizing property that contributes to the economy. “The reform removes productive real estate from the base, properties rented for more than one year and meeting environmental standards, while integrating unproductive assets: non-productive real estate, tangible movable property like gold, cars, yachts, digital assets, and life insurance funds not allocated to productive investment,” the amendment’s explanatory note read. The reaction from the French crypto community has been strongly negative, with naysayers like Éric Larchevêque, co-founder of hardware wallet maker Ledger, saying it “punishes all savers who wish to financially anchor themselves to gold and Bitcoin in order to protect their future.” Writing about his sentiments on X last Saturday, Larchevêque told individuals holding substantial amounts of digital assets they might be forced to sell their crypto holdings to meet tax obligations if they lack other liquid assets. Après le rejet de la taxe Zucman, je pensais qu'on allait enfin pouvoir passer à autre chose et revenir à nos vrais sujets positifs de contribution économique au pays. Mais voila que l'amendement de l'IFI sur la richesse "improductive" a été voté hier soir. Seront désormais… — Eric Larchevêque (@EricLarch) November 1, 2025 He also cautioned that while the initial threshold is set at €2 million, lawmakers could later lower it, which could negatively impact investors within France’s borders. “Crypto is equated with an unproductive reserve, not useful to the real economy. This is a major ideological error, punishing the holding of value outside the fiat monetary system,” Larchevêque concluded. According to Cyrille Briere, a decentralized finance entrepreneur and consultant for Lagoon Finance, the law only affects crypto holdings, as the government has exempted stocks. “France recently voted a 1% yearly capital tax on unproductive assets when their worth exceeds €1.3 million. Yes, you read correctly: capital, not profit. That asset class includes cryptos but excludes stocks,” he wrote on X Sunday evening, responding to Larchevêque’s opinionated post. Briere stated that the measure might discourage investment and innovation and challenged lawmakers’ motives for safeguarding traditional financial instruments while going after Bitcoin holders. “If you don’t want your cryptos stolen either by kidnappers or the state,” he added sarcastically, “just ask your old pal Larry Fink to convert them to stocks.” France looking to accumulate BTC amid taxation queries French lawmakers are pushing to tax “unproductive crypto wealth” just a week after pro-crypto proponents tabled a bill proposing to accumulate up to 2% of Bitcoin’s fixed supply in a national strategic reserve, similar to the plans of the current US administration. As reported by Cryptopolitan, the proposal championed by Eric Ciotti, the president of the center-right Union of the Right (UDR), could make France the first European country to formally establish a Bitcoin treasury. Alexander Laizet, Director of Bitcoin Strategy at The Blockchain Group, explained that the initiative could acquire approximately 420,000 BTC over a period of seven to eight years through nuclear and hydroelectric-powered mining, combined with perpetual holding of the coins. Don’t just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Zero Hash MiCA License: Strategic EU Approval Unlocks European Growth
body: BitcoinWorld Zero Hash MiCA License: Strategic EU Approval Unlocks European Growth The world of digital finance is constantly evolving, and regulatory clarity is often the key to unlocking its full potential. A significant development has just emerged that promises to reshape the landscape for stablecoins in Europe. We’re talking about the recent achievement by Zero Hash, a leading stablecoin infrastructure startup, which has successfully obtained a crucial Zero Hash MiCA license . This isn’t just a piece of paper; it’s a gateway to vast opportunities across the European Economic Area (EEA). What Does the Zero Hash MiCA License Mean for Europe? Zero Hash’s recent acquisition of a Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) license from the Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM) marks a pivotal moment. This license grants Zero Hash the authority to offer stablecoin-related services to an extensive network of clients. Specifically, this includes: Banks Fintech companies Payment platforms This reach extends across 30 countries within the European Economic Area, creating a unified and regulated framework for stablecoin operations. The MiCA regulation itself is designed to provide legal certainty for crypto-asset issuers and service providers, fostering innovation while ensuring consumer protection. Why is the Zero Hash MiCA License a Game-Changer for Stablecoins? The impact of this Zero Hash MiCA license cannot be overstated. For financial institutions and technology firms looking to integrate stablecoins into their offerings, regulatory compliance has always been a significant hurdle. Now, with Zero Hash’s licensed status, these entities can confidently tap into stablecoin services. Consider the benefits: Enhanced Trust: Operating under a MiCA license instills greater confidence among traditional financial players. Simplified Integration: Businesses can leverage Zero Hash’s infrastructure without navigating complex, fragmented national regulations. Broader Reach: Access to a vast European market for stablecoin-powered products and services. This regulatory clarity provided by the Zero Hash MiCA license is essential for mainstream adoption of digital assets. Zero Hash’s Strategic Vision and Past Interest from Mastercard Zero Hash has been on a remarkable trajectory, consistently positioning itself at the forefront of crypto infrastructure. This latest regulatory achievement with the Zero Hash MiCA license further solidifies its standing. It’s worth remembering that the company has attracted significant attention, even from financial giants. For instance, Fortune previously reported that Mastercard had plans to acquire Zero Hash for an estimated $2 billion. While that particular deal may not have materialized, it highlights: The immense value Zero Hash brings to the digital asset ecosystem. The growing recognition of stablecoin infrastructure as a critical component of future finance. Zero Hash’s strategic importance in bridging traditional finance with the crypto world. Such interest underscores the strategic importance of companies like Zero Hash in the evolving financial landscape. Navigating the Regulatory Landscape: The Path Forward with the Zero Hash MiCA License The European Union’s MiCA regulation is a landmark piece of legislation, setting a global precedent for comprehensive crypto regulation. By securing this Zero Hash MiCA license , Zero Hash is not just complying with rules; it is actively participating in shaping a more secure and accessible digital economy. This move encourages other players in the industry to pursue similar regulatory approvals, fostering a more mature and reliable crypto market. The future of finance is increasingly digital, and stablecoins are poised to play a crucial role in cross-border payments, remittances, and decentralized finance. Zero Hash, with its newfound European regulatory approval, is now exceptionally well-positioned to drive this innovation forward responsibly. The acquisition of the Zero Hash MiCA license represents a significant milestone, not just for Zero Hash, but for the entire stablecoin industry in Europe. It paves the way for greater institutional adoption, fosters trust, and provides a clear regulatory pathway for businesses operating in the digital asset space. This strategic move by Zero Hash is set to accelerate the integration of stablecoins into mainstream financial services, marking a new era of regulated crypto innovation. Frequently Asked Questions About Zero Hash’s MiCA License Q1: What is a MiCA license? A1: MiCA stands for Markets in Crypto-Assets. It is a comprehensive regulatory framework established by the European Union to provide legal certainty for crypto-asset issuers and service providers, ensuring consumer protection and market integrity across the EEA. Q2: Which authority granted Zero Hash its MiCA license? A2: The Zero Hash MiCA license was granted by the Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM), which is the financial market regulator in the Netherlands. Q3: In how many countries can Zero Hash now operate stablecoin services? A3: With the MiCA license, Zero Hash can now provide stablecoin-related services across 30 countries within the European Economic Area (EEA). Q4: Who will benefit from Zero Hash’s expanded services? A4: The expanded services will primarily benefit banks, fintech companies, and payment platforms looking to integrate regulated stablecoin services into their offerings across Europe. Q5: Why is the Zero Hash MiCA license important for the stablecoin market? A5: The Zero Hash MiCA license is crucial because it provides regulatory clarity and trust, encouraging greater adoption of stablecoins by traditional financial institutions and facilitating seamless, compliant operations across the diverse European market. Found this article insightful? Don’t keep this vital news to yourself! Share it with your network on social media and spark a conversation about the future of regulated stablecoins in Europe. Your insights help us all understand the evolving crypto landscape better! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping stablecoin institutional adoption. This post Zero Hash MiCA License: Strategic EU Approval Unlocks European Growth first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: What Crypto to Invest in as Market Turns Bullish Again
body: The crypto market is showing renewed optimism. Bitcoin and Ethereum are climbing again, and traders are analyzing crypto charts to find the next major opportunity. Investors are now looking for projects that offer real use cases, not just hype. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is standing out as a crypto to buy now, combining strong presale demand with innovative lending features and stablecoin-backed reliability. Its design is focused on long-term value creation, making it a strategic choice for those preparing for the next bull run. Presale Strength and Early Gains Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has a total supply of 4 billion tokens and has already generated about $18.3 million across presale phases. Currently in Phase 6 at $0.035, 72% of the 170 million token allocation has been sold to over 17,700 holders. The next phase will raise the price to $0.040, a 15% increase. An investor who swapped $5,000 in SOL for Phase 1 MUTM at $0.01 now holds a stake worth $17,500 and will reach $30,000 when the token reaches Phase 11 pricing at $0.06. Analysts forecast up to 8x growth post-listing as platform adoption increases. This presale momentum demonstrates strong demand and positions MUTM as a top contender for attention from both retail and institutional participants, including crypto ETF funds that track emerging high-demand tokens. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is building dual lending options through Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P) systems. Investors will lend, borrow, and earn interest while keeping their assets as collateral. The upcoming V1 of protocol on Sepolia Testnet, launching in Q4 2025, will include Liquidity Pools, mtToken, and Debt Token systems. In the early stage, users will be able to lend, borrow, and use ETH or USDT as collateral. This infrastructure ensures that participants experience real decentralized finance operations, not just presale promises, giving early adopters exposure to working DeFi mechanics. Stablecoin Innovation and Oracle Reliability A major growth driver for Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be its decentralized stablecoin, pegged at $1. Users will mint the stablecoin when borrowing against ETH and burn it when loans are repaid or liquidated. Governance will adjust interest rates to keep the peg stable, while arbitrage mechanisms will maintain balance. Overcollateralization protects the system, ensuring security for all participants. This stablecoin will create a reliable flow of borrowing activity, leading to continuous lending volume, recurring platform fees, and stronger MUTM ecosystem benefits. Early and long-term users will profit from this structure as it supports consistent token demand and platform growth. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will also use Chainlink-based oracles for precise price discovery. Fallback oracles and aggregated feeds will support redundancy, ensuring accurate valuations for ETH, BTC, and stablecoins. title: Near Protocol Price Prediction: Unveiling an Explosive NEAR Price Surge by 2030
body: BitcoinWorld Near Protocol Price Prediction: Unveiling an Explosive NEAR Price Surge by 2030 Are you tracking the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies and wondering about the next big mover? Near Protocol price prediction is a hot topic among investors and blockchain enthusiasts alike. With its innovative technology and growing ecosystem, Near Protocol has carved a significant niche. Many are now asking: could NEAR crypto be on the verge of an explosive surge, potentially doubling its value by 2030? This comprehensive guide dives deep into the factors influencing NEAR’s future, offering insights into its potential trajectory over the coming years. Understanding Near Protocol: What Drives NEAR Crypto? Before we delve into specific price predictions, it’s crucial to understand what Near Protocol is and what makes it unique. Near Protocol is a decentralized application platform designed to make dApps usable on the web. It aims to solve some of the most pressing challenges faced by other blockchain networks, such as scalability, speed, and user-friendliness. Sharding Technology: Near Protocol utilizes a unique sharding mechanism called Nightshade. This allows the network to process transactions in parallel, significantly increasing its throughput and scalability without compromising security. Developer-Friendly: It offers an intuitive platform for developers, supporting popular programming languages like Rust and AssemblyScript, which lowers the barrier to entry for building dApps. Usability for End-Users: Near focuses on user experience, offering features like human-readable account names and simplified transaction processes, making it more accessible for mainstream adoption. Proof-of-Stake Consensus: As a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) blockchain, Near Protocol is energy-efficient and enables participants to stake their NEAR crypto tokens to secure the network and earn rewards. These core technological advantages position Near Protocol as a strong contender in the competitive Layer 1 blockchain space, attracting developers and users who seek efficient and scalable solutions. Historical Performance: A Look Back at NEAR Token Analysis To project future movements, a thorough NEAR token analysis of its past performance is essential. Since its launch, NEAR has experienced periods of significant growth and market corrections, characteristic of the volatile crypto market. The token’s journey has been marked by: Initial Public Offering (IPO) and Early Growth: After its launch, NEAR gained traction, benefiting from the broader crypto bull runs and increasing interest in scalable blockchain solutions. Market Corrections: Like most cryptocurrencies, NEAR has also faced downturns during bear markets, testing the resilience of its community and technology. Key Milestones: Price surges often correlated with major protocol upgrades, successful ecosystem projects, significant partnerships, or increased developer activity on the network. Understanding these historical trends helps us contextualize current market conditions and anticipate how future developments might impact the Near Protocol price prediction . The token has demonstrated its ability to recover and grow, reflecting underlying confidence in its technology and vision. Factors Influencing Near Protocol Price Prediction Predicting cryptocurrency prices is complex, influenced by a multitude of interconnected factors. For a robust Near Protocol price prediction , we must consider both internal protocol developments and external market dynamics. Here are some critical factors: Technological Advancements and Upgrades: Continuous improvements to Near’s sharding, scalability, and security features can significantly boost investor confidence and adoption. The successful implementation of new functionalities makes the network more attractive for dApp development and user engagement. Ecosystem Growth and Adoption: The number of decentralized applications (dApps) built on Near, the total value locked (TVL) in its DeFi protocols, and the expansion of its user base are vital indicators. More projects and users mean higher demand for NEAR crypto for transactions, staking, and governance. Partnerships and Integrations: Collaborations with major tech companies, other blockchain networks, or traditional finance institutions can open up new use cases and introduce Near to a broader audience, driving demand. Macroeconomic Conditions and Regulatory Environment: Broader economic trends, such as inflation, interest rates, and geopolitical events, can influence investor sentiment across all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies. Additionally, evolving crypto regulations worldwide can either foster or hinder adoption. Competitive Landscape: Near operates in a highly competitive Layer 1 blockchain space, vying with established players like Ethereum, Solana, and Polkadot. Its ability to innovate and maintain a competitive edge is crucial for sustained growth. Market Sentiment and Speculation: Social media trends, news cycles, and overall market sentiment play a significant role in short-term price movements. Hype and fear can lead to rapid price swings. These elements combine to create a dynamic environment where the value of NEAR is constantly being reassessed by the market. NEAR Price Forecast: Expert Insights for 2025 Looking ahead to 2025, various analysts and models offer a range of perspectives on the NEAR price forecast . The general sentiment leans towards continued growth, driven by anticipated advancements within the Near ecosystem and a potential resurgence in the broader crypto market. Many experts believe that by 2025, Near Protocol will have further cemented its position as a leading Layer 1 blockchain. The completion of key roadmap milestones, such as further sharding enhancements and increased interoperability with other chains, could act as significant catalysts. Potential Scenarios for NEAR in 2025: Bullish Scenario: If the overall crypto market experiences another bull run, fueled by institutional adoption and clearer regulatory frameworks, NEAR could see substantial gains. Strong dApp growth, particularly in DeFi and NFTs on the Near network, would further bolster its value. In this scenario, some predictions suggest NEAR could reach significant new highs, potentially surpassing previous all-time highs. Moderate Growth Scenario: A more conservative outlook anticipates steady but less dramatic growth. This would be driven by organic adoption and consistent development, even if the broader market remains somewhat subdued. NEAR would continue to build its ecosystem and attract users, leading to gradual price appreciation. Bearish Scenario: Should the crypto market face prolonged downturns, or if Near Protocol encounters significant technical challenges or fails to attract sufficient developer talent and user adoption, its price could stagnate or decline. Increased competition could also pressure its market share. While specific price targets vary widely, the consensus points to a positive outlook for Near Protocol 2025 , contingent on successful execution of its roadmap and favorable market conditions. Investors should conduct their own research and consider these various possibilities. Navigating the Future: Near Protocol 2026-2030 Outlook The long-term outlook for Near Protocol 2025 (extending to 2026-2030) suggests an even greater potential for growth, including the possibility of an explosive 2X surge or more. This extended timeframe allows for the full maturation of Near’s technology and widespread adoption. By 2030, the blockchain landscape is expected to be vastly different, with highly scalable and interoperable networks taking center stage. Near Protocol’s foundational design, focusing on sharding and usability, positions it well to thrive in such an environment. Key drivers for long-term growth: Mass Adoption of Web3: As Web3 technologies become more integrated into daily life, platforms like Near, which prioritize user experience, are likely to see exponential growth in user numbers and transaction volume. Interoperability Solutions: Near’s commitment to interoperability, connecting with other blockchains, will be crucial. This allows for seamless transfer of assets and data, expanding its utility and network effects. Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs): The increasing prevalence of DAOs built on Near could drive demand for NEAR tokens for governance and participation. Continued Innovation: The Near Foundation’s dedication to research and development will ensure the protocol remains at the forefront of blockchain innovation, adapting to new challenges and opportunities. If Near Protocol successfully executes its long-term vision, maintains its technological edge, and fosters a vibrant ecosystem, achieving a 2X surge from current levels by 2030 is a realistic, if not conservative, projection. Some more optimistic models even foresee higher multiples, driven by widespread institutional and retail adoption. Potential Challenges and Risks for NEAR While the future for Near Protocol appears promising, it’s important to acknowledge the potential challenges and risks that could impact its growth trajectory and NEAR price forecast . Intense Competition: The Layer 1 blockchain space is fiercely competitive. Near must continuously innovate to stay ahead of rivals like Ethereum (with its scaling solutions), Solana, Avalanche, and Polkadot, which also offer high-performance alternatives. Technological Hurdles: Implementing advanced sharding and maintaining network security at scale are complex tasks. Any significant technical setbacks or vulnerabilities could erode trust and hinder adoption. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving global regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies poses a risk. Unfavorable regulations in key markets could impact NEAR’s accessibility and utility. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are inherently volatile. External market shocks, global economic downturns, or significant shifts in investor sentiment can lead to rapid price corrections, regardless of a project’s fundamentals. Centralization Concerns: While Near is decentralized, concerns about validator distribution or governance concentration could arise as the network scales, potentially impacting its long-term appeal. Investors should carefully weigh these risks against the potential rewards when considering an investment in NEAR crypto . Actionable Insights for Investors: Is NEAR a Buy? Given the detailed NEAR token analysis and future projections, what are the actionable insights for potential investors? Deciding whether NEAR is a good investment depends on individual risk tolerance, investment horizon, and personal research. Here are some considerations: Conduct Thorough Research (DYOR): Before investing, delve deeper into Near Protocol’s whitepaper, development roadmap, team, partnerships, and community activity. Understand its technology and competitive advantages. Consider Your Investment Horizon: Short-term trading in cryptocurrencies is highly speculative. For those looking at the long-term Near Protocol price prediction (2025-2030), a ‘hodling’ strategy might be more suitable, focusing on the project’s fundamental growth. Risk Management: Allocate only capital you can afford to lose. Cryptocurrencies are high-risk assets. Diversifying your portfolio across different assets and sectors can mitigate risk. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of Near Protocol’s official announcements, network upgrades, ecosystem developments, and broader crypto market news. Information is power in this fast-moving space. Technical vs. Fundamental Analysis: While fundamental analysis (project strength, adoption) drives long-term value, technical analysis can help identify optimal entry and exit points for those interested in shorter-term trades. While an explosive surge is certainly a possibility, a balanced approach, combining optimism with caution, is always advisable. Conclusion: The Compelling Future of Near Protocol Near Protocol stands as a formidable contender in the blockchain arena, distinguished by its innovative sharding technology, developer-friendly environment, and commitment to user experience. Our comprehensive Near Protocol price prediction for 2025-2030 suggests a strong potential for growth, with the prospect of a 2X surge being a realistic outcome, driven by continued technological advancements, ecosystem expansion, and increasing Web3 adoption. While challenges such as intense competition and market volatility remain, Near’s robust fundamentals and dedicated community position it well to navigate these hurdles. For investors seeking exposure to a scalable, high-performance blockchain, NEAR crypto presents a compelling opportunity. As the digital economy evolves, Near Protocol aims to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of decentralized applications, offering an exciting journey for those who believe in its long-term vision. FAQs About Near Protocol and NEAR Price Q1: What is Near Protocol? Near Protocol is a decentralized application platform designed for scalability and usability, aiming to power the next generation of Web3 applications. It uses sharding technology to achieve high transaction speeds and low fees. Q2: What is the NEAR token used for? The NEAR token is the native cryptocurrency of the Near Protocol. It is used for transaction fees, staking to secure the network, and participating in governance decisions for the protocol’s future development. Q3: Is Near Protocol a good investment? Whether Near Protocol is a good investment depends on an individual’s financial goals and risk tolerance. It possesses strong fundamentals and growth potential but is also subject to the inherent volatility of the cryptocurrency market. It’s crucial to conduct thorough research. Q4: Who founded Near Protocol? Near Protocol was founded by Illia Polosukhin and Alexander Skidanov . Both have extensive backgrounds in software development and engineering, with previous experience at companies like Google and Microsoft. Q5: What are the risks of investing in NEAR? Key risks include intense competition from other Layer 1 blockchains, potential technical challenges, regulatory uncertainties, and the overall high volatility of the cryptocurrency market. Investors should be prepared for potential price fluctuations. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Near Protocol institutional adoption. This post Near Protocol Price Prediction: Unveiling an Explosive NEAR Price Surge by 2030 first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Crucial Clarification: Zhao Confirms GIGGLE Not Official Giggle Academy Coin
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial Clarification: Zhao Confirms GIGGLE Not Official Giggle Academy Coin The cryptocurrency world often buzzes with new projects and digital assets, leading to both excitement and occasional confusion. Recently, a significant clarification emerged directly from Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, or CZ, regarding the relationship between the memecoin GIGGLE and the educational initiative known as Giggle Academy . This crucial announcement aims to set the record straight and provide much-needed clarity for the community, especially those interested in the evolving crypto landscape. What’s the Buzz Around GIGGLE and Giggle Academy? The rise of memecoins has been one of the most intriguing phenomena in the crypto space. These digital tokens, often inspired by internet memes or popular culture, gain value primarily through community hype and speculation rather than inherent utility. GIGGLE, a memecoin that recently gained traction, quickly caught the attention of many. Simultaneously, the concept of Giggle Academy , an educational project supported by CZ, has been gaining momentum. This initiative focuses on providing accessible education, aligning with broader philanthropic goals. The similar names naturally led to speculation and a potential misunderstanding: was GIGGLE the official cryptocurrency for the Giggle Academy? This overlap created a scenario where a direct statement was necessary to avoid any misrepresentation or confusion among potential supporters and investors. CZ’s proactive approach underscores the importance of transparent communication in the rapidly evolving crypto landscape. Why Did Changpeng Zhao Make This Clarification? Changpeng Zhao, a highly influential figure in the crypto industry, used his platform on X (formerly Twitter) to address the growing speculation head-on. He explicitly stated that the GIGGLE memecoin is not the official coin of Giggle Academy . This distinction is vital for several reasons: Preventing Misinformation: Official endorsements carry significant weight. Without a clear statement, users might mistakenly believe GIGGLE was an official part of the Giggle Academy ecosystem, potentially influencing investment decisions based on false premises. Protecting the Academy’s Integrity: Giggle Academy is an educational charity. Associating it directly with a speculative memecoin without official ties could dilute its mission or expose it to market volatility beyond its control. Ensuring Transparency: CZ’s clarification demonstrates a commitment to transparency, a cornerstone of trust in the crypto space. He acknowledged the donations being made through the coin but emphasized the lack of official connection. This move highlights the ongoing challenge of separating legitimate projects from community-driven tokens, especially when names or concepts might overlap. For anyone involved with Giggle Academy , this clarification provides a clear boundary. How Does Binance Support Charitable Projects Related to Giggle Academy? While GIGGLE is not the official coin, Binance, under CZ’s leadership, has shown support for charitable endeavors, including those aligned with the spirit of Giggle Academy . In a separate announcement, Binance revealed its plan to donate 50% of spot and margin trading fees generated from GIGGLE to charitable projects. These donations are specifically directed towards initiatives supported by the Giggle Fund. This means that while the memecoin itself isn’t “official,” its trading activity on Binance can still contribute positively to charitable causes. It’s an interesting model where market activity, even around a non-official asset, can be leveraged for social good. This initiative underscores Binance’s broader commitment to philanthropy and its understanding of the power of community-driven efforts. It also provides a clear example of how platforms can channel market interest into tangible benefits, even when the underlying asset is independent of a specific project like Giggle Academy . What Does This Mean for the Future of Giggle Academy and Its Community? For supporters and potential beneficiaries of Giggle Academy , this clarification reinforces the academy’s independent mission. It means the educational initiative stands on its own merits, separate from the speculative nature of a memecoin. This clarity can help the academy focus on its core goals without the distractions or volatility associated with a crypto asset it doesn’t officially endorse. For cryptocurrency investors and enthusiasts, CZ’s statement serves as a valuable reminder: Always Verify: Before investing or supporting any project, always verify official endorsements and affiliations directly from the source. Understand the Asset: Distinguish between projects with inherent utility and those driven primarily by community sentiment, like many memecoins. Due Diligence is Key: Conduct thorough research to understand what you are investing in and its true connection to any related initiatives. The distinction made by CZ is a positive step towards greater transparency in the crypto space, especially concerning educational and charitable ventures like Giggle Academy . It encourages a more informed and responsible approach from all participants. Changpeng Zhao’s direct clarification about the GIGGLE memecoin and Giggle Academy is a vital moment for transparency in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. It clearly separates a community-driven digital asset from a dedicated educational initiative, ensuring that the mission of Giggle Academy remains unclouded by market speculation. While Binance’s charitable contributions from GIGGLE trading are commendable, this episode serves as a powerful reminder for everyone to always seek official confirmation and exercise due diligence in the dynamic world of crypto. Clarity is not just good practice; it’s essential for building trust and fostering sustainable growth for genuine projects. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Giggle Academy? A: Giggle Academy is an educational initiative, supported by Changpeng Zhao, focused on providing accessible learning opportunities. It is a charitable project with a mission to deliver education. Q2: Is GIGGLE an official coin of Giggle Academy? A: No, Changpeng Zhao has explicitly clarified that the GIGGLE memecoin is not the official coin of Giggle Academy. They are separate entities. Q3: Who issued the GIGGLE memecoin? A: CZ stated that he does not know who issued the GIGGLE memecoin. It is a community-driven token without an official endorsement from Giggle Academy. Q4: How is Binance supporting charitable projects related to Giggle Academy? A: Binance plans to donate 50% of spot and margin trading fees generated from GIGGLE to charitable projects supported by the Giggle Fund, thereby contributing to philanthropic causes. Q5: What is a memecoin? A: A memecoin is a cryptocurrency often inspired by internet memes or popular culture, primarily driven by community hype and speculation rather than inherent utility or a specific project’s official endorsement. Did you find this clarification helpful? Share this article on your social media to help others understand the distinction between the GIGGLE memecoin and the important work of Giggle Academy. Let’s spread awareness and encourage informed decision-making in the crypto community! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping memecoins and their impact on charitable initiatives. This post Crucial Clarification: Zhao Confirms GIGGLE Not Official Giggle Academy Coin first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Analyst to XRP Holders: Better Get Used to Hear This Price Target
body: Crypto analyst Dark Defender has reiterated his long-term price target for XRP . \he maintains that the digital asset could eventually reach $36.76. The statement, which revisits one of the boldest projections in the XRP community, reflects the analyst’s continued confidence in his technical analysis framework. While no specific timeframe was mentioned, the forecast suggests a significant revaluation if market dynamics align with historical technical patterns. According to CoinMarketCap, XRP is currently trading at $2.40. For Dark Defender’s projection to materialize, XRP would need to rise by approximately 1,400% from its current level. The analyst has consistently based his long-term outlook on Elliott Wave Theory and Fibonacci extensions, both of which point to potential upward cycles once consolidation phases conclude. XRP targets $36.76. Better get used to hear this. — Dark Defender (@DefendDark) October 31, 2025 Community Reactions Reflect Skepticism While Dark Defender’s confidence remains intact, the broader response on X was defined by skepticism and frustration from traders and observers. User afsheenjaf voiced strong doubt, questioning what real catalyst could propel XRP above even $5, let alone $36. He dismissed the idea as unrealistic, highlighting the lack of clear market drivers and criticizing what he described as overly optimistic projections unsupported by tangible developments. User J expressed disappointment over the repetition of similar forecasts in the past, noting that such high expectations have been heard “all the time” but have never materialized. He remarked that many in the community are to “nothing ever happening,” reflecting fatigue over repeated high-value targets without results. Similarly, Danuxis offered a critical perspective on crypto analysts more broadly, comparing them to “fortune tellers” who often share optimistic scenarios to attract engagement or paid subscriptions. His comment underscored a growing sense of skepticism among investors who view extreme predictions as detached from current market realities. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Persistent Optimism vs. Market Realities Despite the criticism, supporters of Dark Defender’s outlook argue that XRP’s fundamentals remain strong, citing its role in global payments and institutional partnerships as long-term catalysts. They maintain that broader adoption and expanding utility could eventually justify higher valuations. However, critics contend that such optimism overlooks the slow pace of real-world adoption and the disconnect between Ripple’s business progress and XRP’s market performance. The debate underscores a widening divide between technical analysts projecting future breakouts and investors demanding verifiable catalysts. Dark Defender’s $36.76 target stands as a bold declaration of faith in technical structure and market cycles. Whether XRP can achieve such a valuation will depend on a convergence of favorable conditions—market sentiment, liquidity growth, institutional usage, and global regulatory alignment—all of which remain uncertain in the near term.
